text: Ana a'mo'a, agra'a agi erisaga nehuno, rama'a monko avu'avaza nehuno, ruga'a havi avu'ava zana hu'ne. Anama hu'nea havi avu'avazama'amofo avamente atazana aminkeno, rama'a zavi ateno. Na'ankure agra'agura anage nehie, kuini mani'na, kuini trate mani'noankina, kento a' knara osu'na, zavira otegahue hu'ne.
